subject: Natural Language Processing
description: Study various applications of NLP and formulate the problem statement for a Mini Project based on a real-world NLP application (e.g., Machine Translation, Text Categorization, Chatbot, Sentiment Analysis, etc.).

subject: Natural Language Processing
description: Apply text preprocessing techniques (Tokenization and Filtration) for a given Indian Regional Language text.

description: Apply stop word removal, lemmatization, and stemming for any given text.

description: Implement the N-Gram model for the given text input.

subject: Natural Language Processing
description: Study POS taggers, perform POS tagging, and apply chunking to the given text.

description: Implement a Named Entity Recognizer (NER) for the given text. Use domain-specific examples such as banking, political news, or tourism.

description: Implement a Text Similarity Recognizer (e.g., for comparing news articles) for selected documents.

description: Perform Exploratory Data Analysis on the given text and generate a Word Cloud.

description: Develop a Bag-of-Words model for Sentiment Analysis.

subject: Natural Language Processing
description: Develop a character-based or word-based Neural Language Model for text generation.

description: Submit a Mini Project Report on a chosen real-world NLP application.

subject: Natural Language Processing
description: Implement and present the Mini Project.

subject: Big Data Analytics

description: Create a Big Data analytics dashboard using Hive and Impala.
